name: Halloween Island
description:
You wake up on a monster-infested island, and the only way out is through the mazes...

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Halloween Island is an RPG Maze-Crawler where you must solve increasingly difficult mazes to complete the game - all while fighting enemies for survival. If you can fight, then you'll be able to kill enemies for items and XP. If you're in a tough spot then use your knowledge of the maze to out-wit your foes. The game is completed on the clearing of maze 10. Good luck!

Time is on your side...

The mazes of Halloween Island become more difficult as you clear them, but the enemies grow more difficult with time. Clearing mazes quickly and efficiently is the key to success!

Controls:

'W,A,S,D' or Arrow Keys - Move Character and Select Battle Options

'Z' or 'Enter' - Select Battle Option

'X' - Cancel Battle Option

'Escape' - Pause

Special thanks to:

Taska - he made a 6x6 flower :)

FiskalFinance - Primary Guinnea Pig
